lowering.sparqlQuery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?inputNodeURI ?pathway_id WHERE { ?inputNodeURI rdf:type <http://localhost:8080/SAWSDL2SADIServlet/getKeggDrugsByPathway/owl#inputClass> . ?inputNodeURI <http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000008> ?sparql_selector_0 . ?sparql_selector_0 rdf:type <http://purl.oclc.org/SADI/LSRN/KEGG_PATHWAY_Identifier> . ?sparql_selector_0 <http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000300> ?pathway_id . }
